title: "Penn Medicine researchers use artificial intelligence to 'redefine' Alzheimer's Disease"
excerpt: "The researchers will apply advanced artificial intelligence (AI) methods to integrate and find patterns in genetic, imaging, and clinical data from over 60,000 Alzheimer's patients -- representing one of the largest and most ambitious research undertakings of its kind."
